Canada, has been helping people excel at communication for over a decade.His unique method of balancing the words chosen with the way that they are spoken, including the visuals, has led to him being a highly desired communication coach in Canada and he has also worked with business leaders from around the world.

A thought-leader in Canada he is called upon frequently by the media to comment on the body language and communication style of political leaders.

Additionally, he is a program advisor to YEDI - the York Entrepreneurship Development Institute in Toronto, Canada.  YEDI offers an intensive two-week program for Start-up entrepreneurs who wish to take advantage of the new Canada Start-up Visa program. This program encourages immigration for entrepreneurs to move to Canada by allowing them to use Canadian venture capital to start their new business.

This ebook offers his best tips, practices and checklists aimed at entrepreneurs to sell, persuade and lead. This 45 page ebook covers all the skills that any entrepreneur can use to develop their communication skills. This includes cultural information for those not entirely familiar with North American culture
